body:
Hello,

i try to use the GH definition from this topic: [http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/hourly-radi...](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/hourly-radiation-data)



from the second "select sky mix" i get this error:

1. Solution exception:'int' object has no attribute 'sort'



Does someone know what's the matter? I updated everything so....



Thank you!

Milan
topic: hourly radiation result: error in select skymix when i connect HOY

replies.body:
thanks for your reply,

it does not work unfortunately... it seems to go wrong with the HOY...



Do you have an alternative idea? or someone else?

thank you!

I guess the weather data is not provided. Please find a revised copy. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/ZP48tQoNiujCVWEi0EyhQzuT-HcCEDKwayrwLLIZzxnBMLILoKATDGNbz*o8FPZ79oZXHAVdaZ6sucz7BozHbeFEyUrQXGae/Capture.png) [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/ZP48tQoNiuhewB7zxbPT1owyljzKwag0PXQuonbekOVJ6SsNUorcr4uhlrv2rg4Cm0b0IiSHwScRlFHhU8oR4Q1tWU2yAORJ/Capture.png) [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/ZP48tQoNiugDtQPqrGdkxZsn5GBl-2f8KBeHL5YXoZQY7MOJdsoyxUymwdPhbFK92X9-dO7swtIOCnSOjnZCT7MI5DIhroww/Capture.png)

ah,

this seems to work.



Thanks a lot!
